nodes.name: ReverseRegistrar
claim
claimWithResolver
setName
node

statements.operations:
{
    let lookup := 0x3031323334353637383961626364656600000000000000000000000000000000
    let i := 40
    loop:
    i := sub(i, 1)
    mstore8(i, byte(and(addr, 0xf), lookup))
    addr := div(addr, 0x10)
    i := sub(i, 1)
    mstore8(i, byte(and(addr, 0xf), lookup))
    addr := div(addr, 0x10)
    jumpi(loop, i)
    ret := keccak256(0, 40)
}
